extendedInfo.description: Galaxy Wars TD is the most anticipated and visually stunning Tower Defense game in the theme of space science fiction. Start your battle on the alien planet now and you will enjoy an incredible game experience.Features:* Stunning graphic effect and game animation (similar to Space Epic).* Super HD (1380x900 and 1980x1200) maps, specially designed for pad.* 12 maps with three difficulty levels; enjoy the endless fun!* Interactive terrains with the open path like the fieldrunners' gameplay.* 10 types of enemy units, including Marine, Marauder, Reaper, Hellion, Siege Tank, Thor, Viking and Battle cruiser.* 8 types of towers, including Machinegun, SAM, Frost, Laser, Plasma, Icon Cannon, Bomb... Each tower has 3 upgrading levels.* Free combination of all turrets.* 3 game modes: Classic, Extended & Endless.* Pinch to zoom in/out the battle field.* You may upgrade your turrets at the weapons shop, which will offer you more fun.* Tons of achievements waiting for you to achieve.------------------------------Try other awesome games by Cat Studio------------------------------"Egypt Zuma - Temple of Anubis" - A Zuma game with egypt theme."Little Commander - World War II TD" - A TD game with very cute visual style."Soldiers of Glory : World War 2" - Act as the Allied commander and win the WWII!"Soldiers of Glory : Modern War" - A TD game that enemies could attack you back!"Epic Defense - the Elements" - A TD game with war3 visual style."Epic Defense 2 - Wind Spells" - the second work of Epic Defense series, more new elements! more new towers!"Galaxy Wars Defense" - A Space Sci-Fi TD with Stunning Graphics and Super Big Maps!"Zerg Must Die" - A TD game with SC2 style. The gameplay very like Defense Grid"Marble Blast - Zodiac" - Another very good Zuma Game, and you can draw your custom levels!"Global Defense: Zombie War" - Do you like killing zombies? You will like this defense game! ------------------------------Cat Studio's Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/CatStudioGamesCat Studio's Tiwtter: https://twitter.com/CatStudio_GamesCat Studio's Youtube Channel: https://youtube.com/CatStudioGames------------------------------

reviews.title: Really fun
reviews.comment: I\'ve been playing thiw game for days now and I\'m hooked. The various tower combinations and styles of maps always keep the map interesting.
reviews.author: Eric Brefka

reviews.title: Solid game
reviews.comment: Great TD game but average graphics and alot of ads. Bought an in game purchase which I hoped would disable ads but not to be so only 3 stars from me till I get the option to remove ads still a great game though all the same.
reviews.author: Kieran Dore

reviews.title: Addictive
reviews.comment: Very challenging.  Even on easy mode.  Really have to use your assets accordingly.
reviews.author: Robert Hobbs

reviews.title: Good TD
reviews.comment: Decent sound and graphics lasers and prism look too similar
reviews.author: Michael Klynchyk

reviews.title: Wish I could play it
reviews.comment: Couldn\'t see any of the descriptions of turrets and couldn\'t select start for the mission. Wouldve love to play the game but...
reviews.author: Brittni McWaters

reviews.title: Decent TD
reviews.comment: Needs more towers. Other than that this is a great TD game.
reviews.author: Ollie Griffis

reviews.title: Great free fun
reviews.comment: Great TD game, long hours of fun and best of all, doesn\'t ask for money. It\'s a rare quality these days
reviews.author: Radu Ghi\305\237oiu

reviews.title: The best their is!
reviews.comment: The ultimate TD game, a must to download. Hours of fun... uninstalled all my other tower games as obsolete now. If I could give ten stars would, great graphics, game play and immersion in to hours of challenge.... well done dev!
reviews.author: Taylor Johnson

reviews.title: Vg game
reviews.comment: Great. maybe better graphics for 5 stars.
reviews.author: cristan stocks

reviews.title: Very addictive!
reviews.comment: Awesome and the weapon shop upgrade thing is epic.. Also its f2p making it even better! Apart from the minor spelling and number errors, the game doesn\'t really need to be improved
reviews.author: Jeremy Young

reviews.title: Is a pretty cool game...
reviews.comment: But it is way too easy to place a turret on the wrong spot, and things don\'t always work if you have big thumbs. So as I\'m fumbling trying to upgrade towers, and it not working, or trying to sell a tower in the wrong spot... I\'m getting over run. I can\'t make it past level one. I\'m going broke with all the towers in the wrong place.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is a decent tower defence game, however for me there are a couple of concerns.  There is a glitch that happens if you save and exit the game as the enemies are coming out of the start gate it will count them as escaping when you resume.\tThe flame tower does not pair with radar towers. I don\'t  know if that was intended or if it is a glitch, but it makes the flame tower a tower I never use. The condenser is listed as being the most powerful weapon, but I find it useless, even fully upgraded in the weapons shop. It does not seem to aim properly and does little damage. Cannon towers seem to suffer from aiming problems as well.  Some enemies  are immune to freeze tower.  Using all prisms all the time makes it become repetitive before long.
reviews.author: Ripe Claw

reviews.title: Enjoyable
reviews.comment: Its a pretty good game overall. Like the fact that upgrades stay at same cost for each level of improvement.
reviews.author: Peter Stockley

reviews.title: Fun & exiting
reviews.comment: Keep it up guys
reviews.author: Fizzy Azman

reviews.title: Classified as an intrusive app
reviews.comment: Downloaded, installed.  AVG has this labeled as spam ware etc. Uninstalling without trying the game.
reviews.author: Will Low

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Love this game.  I had everything maxed out on the original.  Its nice to see it back.  It would be cool to see new enemies or get different weapons after you have maxed all of the upgrades.
reviews.author: Mark Hewitt

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Fun fun fun.
reviews.author: Chasidy Bean

reviews.title: Hectic Fun
reviews.comment: No BS and a solid tower defense game. Decent crack cocaine

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Love it

reviews.title: Goodgame
reviews.comment: All around pick up and go TD game basic but fun to playwhile on a bus
